dublin_core.dcvalue: Functional and semantic interoperability requirements for ubiquitous personalised health services reach beyond current concepts of health information integration among professional stakeholders and related Electronic Patient Records eHealth Future health telematics infrastructures have particularly to maintain semantic interoperability among systems using different coding schemes and terminologies and to include home personal and mobile systems
Studies in health technology and informatics
Interoperability--a key infrastructure requirement for personalised health services.
